oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Mr. G. W. Cook from W. B. Airhart
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to Mr. G. W. Cook from W. B. Airhart. The letter discusses the effects of the war on the Confederate and Union soldiers in town. He also comments on the fighting at Corinth, Miss. and Kentucky and a fight in East Tennesee where Co[l]. Vaughn captured prisoners, horses, and camp equipment.
